type Hyperlink = class inherit Span interface ICommandSource interface IUriContext

summary.span: An inline-level flow content element that provides facilities for hosting hyperlinks within flow content.

span.span: An inline-level flow content element that provides facilities for hosting hyperlinks within flow content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现设置的属性单击超链接时应导航到的内容。 implements the property that you set with the of the content that should be navigated to when the Hyperlink is clicked. 导航才能发生，但是，如果任一的直接或间接父是导航主机，包括， ，或可以承载任何浏览器[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)](其中包括[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)]，和Firefox 2.0 +)。 navigation can only occur, however, if either the direct or indirect parent of a is a navigation host, including , , or any browser that can host [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] (which includes [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)], and Firefox 2.0+). 有关详细信息，请参阅**导航主机**中的主题[导航概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md)。For more information, see the **Navigation Hosts** topic in [Navigation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md). 强制实施子内容的强内容模型。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 请参阅[TextElement 内容模型概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md)有关详细信息内容模型。See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information about the content model. 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用简单的元素。The following example shows simple use of a element. [!code-xaml[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUriXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_hyperlink_navurixaml)] 下面的示例演示如何创建以编程方式。The following example shows how to create a programmatically. block.para: 可以导航到的值属性仅当直接或间接父是导航主机，包括， ，或可以承载任何浏览器 [！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] (其中包括 [！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]，[！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)]，和 Firefox 2.0 +)。有关详细信息，请参阅 * * 导航主机 * * 部分中 [导航 Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md)。

can navigate to the value of the property only if either the direct or indirect parent of a is a navigation host, including , , or any browser that can host [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] (which includes [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)], and Firefox 2.0+). For more information, see the **Navigation Hosts** section in [Navigation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要链接到特定内联元素，指定前面带有井号符号的元素名称 （#）。To link to a particular inline element, specify the element name preceded by a pound symbol (#). 当用户悬停鼠标中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]存储在属性显示在状态栏中。When a user hovers the mouse over a in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] stored in the property is displayed in the status bar. 导航到此[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]当用户单击。 navigates to this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] when the user clicks the . 如果的值属性更改后用户单击和后续导航请求之前忽略的新值属性，并导航到[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]已值当用户单击时，属性。If the value of the property changes after the user clicks the and before the subsequent navigation request, ignores the new value of the property and navigates to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that was the value of the property when the user clicked the . > [!NOTE] > 你不限制为仅使用进行导航。You are not restricted to only using a to do navigation. 你可以使用附加属性，但仅从以下： ， ， ，和。You can use the attached property as well, but only from the following: , , , and . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性元素。The following example shows how to use the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUriXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_hyperlink_navurixaml)] 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUri](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_hyperlink_navuri)] [!code-vb[HyperlinkSnippets#_Hyperlink_NavUri](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HyperlinkSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_hyperlink_navuri)] 下面的示例演示如何使用**mailto:** [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]若要打开新的邮件窗口，其中包含电子邮件地址、 电子邮件地址和一个主题和电子邮件地址，使用者，和正文。The following example shows how to use a **mailto:**[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] to open a new mail window that contains an email address, an email address and a subject, and an email address, subject, and body. [!code-xaml[HOWTONavigationMailToSnippet#MailToMARKUP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationMailToSnippet/CS/HomePage.xaml#mailtomarkup)]

summary.span: Handles the routed event.

span.span: Handles the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法导航到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]指定的属性，以及标记[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]为已访问。This method navigates to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] specified by the property, and marks the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] as visited. > [!IMPORTANT] > 根据主机计算机的安全配置，某些形式的导航 (例如，导航到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unc](~/includes/tlasharptla-unc-md.md)]路径) 不允许在 Internet 区域中。Depending on the host computer's security configuration, certain forms of navigation (for example, navigating to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unc](~/includes/tlasharptla-unc-md.md)] path) are not allowed in the Internet zone. 在这种情况下，此方法将要求完全信任。In such cases, this method will demand full trust. 有关详细信息，请参阅[代码访问安全性](~/docs/framework/misc/code-access-security.md)。For more information, see [Code Access Security](~/docs/framework/misc/code-access-security.md).
